Posts.Content: Thegarcias2008 wrote: I was just diagnosed with Paget's disease and my husband and I would like to hear some testimonials.  Looking for support from anyone who can help us prepare for treatment and recovery.  What can  we expect and what should we plan for?!?!  Rebecca Log in to post a reply
